title: So this is the way i had to find out that china has been occupying our territories
selftext: I know there was a border conflict between india and china a while ago, but i never anticipated that it was this bad, and moreover it's worse that i had to find out about it through international media. Most news outlets in india are a disgrace and they should be ashamed. Keeping the public uninformed is a disservice to indians and makes these news outlets by far one of the most anti-nationals.
